article:
This entry describes performance management in an Information Technology
context. See '[[Performance Management]]' for a description of performance
management in a more general context.

'IT performance management' is a term used in the Information Technology (IT)
field, and generally refers to the monitoring and measurement of relevant
performance metrics to assess the performance of IT resources. It can be used in
both a business or IT Management context, and an IT Operations context.
Companies who offer IT performance management tools include TeamQuest, IBM, CA,
BMC,SevOne and HP Software

Some of the different types and categories of IT performance management include
those related to networks, applications, self-learning, and business
transactions.
